mapper.select: SELECT `status`, COUNT(company_id) as number FROM exchange_company GROUP BY `status`

SELECT a.`name` as name, COUNT(c.company_id) as count FROM exchange_company ec LEFT JOIN company c ON ec.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN area a ON c.area_id = a.area_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.area_id > 0 GROUP BY a.area_id

SELECT c.`name` as name, ec.approve_department as approveDepartment , ec.supervise_department superviseDepartment, c.legal_person legalPerson FROM exchange_company ec LEFT JOIN company c ON ec.company_id = c.company_id WHERE ec.`status` = 4

SELECT c.`name`, c.address, c.registered_capital as registeredCapital, c.registered_date as registeredDate FROM exchange_company ec LEFT JOIN company c ON ec.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN area a ON c.area_id = a.area_id WHERE a.area_id = #{areaId}
ORDER BY c.registered_capital
ORDER BY c.registered_date
